title: Adverbs
body: The <alman /> dialect maintains standard German's lack of adjectival inflection in adverbial usage, preserving unmodified forms for words functioning as verb or adjective modifiers rather than direct noun descriptors.

rules.title: Adverbs Stay the Same
rules.description:
Words functioning adverbially retain their base form without receiving the -e ending required for attributive adjectives. This applies to:
- Adverbs modifying verbs
- Adjectives modifying other adjectives
- Phrasal modifiers not directly preceding a noun
